text: Futhi sanenzela amakameli ukuthi abe ngezinye zezimpawu zikaMvelinqangiokwenulaphoubuhlengakho-kekhumbulani igama lika Mvelinqangi kuzona (izilwane zomnikelo) uma sezingolayini (zilungele ukwenziwa umnikelo) uma seziwile ngamacala azo (emva kokuba sezihlinziwe) ngakho-ke yidlani kuzona niphe ompofu nocelayo, sinenzele kwaba kanjalo ukuze nibonge
